Licenses.text: Goodman Casino has received an operating permit and a license from the Curacao Gambling Commission. Curacao is an entity that is part of the United Kingdom of the Netherlands. Gambling licenses on the island have been issued since 2002, so the subject can officially be considered one of the best and most reliable licensors. Monitoring of gambling companies by the Curacao Gambling Commission includes:

items: verification of all services, gaming conditions, results, and rates within five years from the date of registration of the company;
analysis of activities following local and international legislation;
monitoring compliance with license terms, including keeping a log of players;
audit of the gaming system of a gambling enterprise, as well as software.
